content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

-- Number of trips made by duration in hours using datediff from t-sql

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS trip_data

SELECT TOP 100
    lpep_pickup_datetime,
    lpep_dropoff_datetime,
    DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60 AS from_hour ,--for hours 
    (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60) + 1 AS to_hour
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS trip_data;


SELECT 
    DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60 AS from_hour ,--for hours 
    (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60) + 1 AS to_hour,
    COUNT(1) AS number_of_trips
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS trip_data
GROUP BY DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60 , 
    (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60) + 1 
ORDER BY from_hour,to_hour;

-- Number of trips made by duration in hours using datediff from t-sql final script

SELECT 
    DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60 AS from_hour ,--for hours 
    (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60) + 1 AS to_hour,
    COUNT(1) AS number_of_trips
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw'
    ) AS trip_data
GROUP BY DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60 , 
    (DATEDIFF(minute,lpep_pickup_datetime,lpep_dropoff_datetime ) / 60) + 1 
ORDER BY from_hour,to_hour;
